resources.string: Pinning App, Guided access similar to IOS
It is forbidden to call out the sidebar when pinned
Jump to the lock screen when unpinned
Please unlock it in the locked app interface

iOS-like Guided Access that pins the current application to the screen\nTo use, press and hold the top status bar, and if you want to exit, press and hold the top status bar again\nThe first time you use it, you need to restart the device.
